title: Alliances & Partners Director
content:
ALLIANCES DIRECTOR France & South Europe (m/f)
Ivalua is a leading provider of cloud-based procurement solutions globally. 
THE OPPORTUNITY
We are currently looking for an Alliances & Partner Director who will manage and develop our Consulting & Implementation Partners while further expanding the Partners ecosystem and nurturing our Advisory firms network.
Partners are core to Ivalua’s strategy, a key to scale Ivalua’s growth and a critical success factor allowing our Customers to unlock the full value of their Ivalua solution, as we are 100% Partner Prime for services.
This Global Partner strategy has been launched 7 years ago and the Alliances Team has been structuring developing a strong Partner Network in the past 6 years, France, Belux being the strongest Partner ecosystem for Ivalua, with more than 500 Ivalua certified consultants to date.
WHAT YOU WILL DO WITH US
Working as the sparring partner of the Regional VP of Sales in South Europe & Africa, and in close collaboration with Sales & Business development teams, your mission will be:

Collaborate to the Go-to-Market strategy of your Sales areas and adapt the regional Partner strategy supporting it.
Develop your strategic Partners (System integrators, Consultancies) and build & track progress of yearly Joint Business Plans defining partnership goals & business development strategies.
Craft Go-to-market strategies with Partners to influence the market, build packaged offerings, push deal-shaping, generate opportunities, and ensure the setup for success along the opportunity’s development.
Carrying out operational cadence and quarterly business reviews with Partners
Recruit & qualify new partners
Implement skills development plan for Partners project teams, and Sales enablement programs.

Building long-term relationships with partners in your region is a key driver for this job, which typically requires travelling 40% of the time.
YOUR PROFILE
If you have the below experience and strengths this role could be for you.
Skills and Experience

At least 10 years of experience in a B2B Enterprise SaaS provider, a Consulting firm or a System Integrator, with Sales, Project direction or Management experience.
Exceptional written and oral communication skills in English and French
You are committed, self-driven, love challenges & able to manage complex situations or conflicts: You define yourself as a Problem-solver.
Experience of complex sales and dealing with Global SI & Big4 types of partners, dealing with C-level and Partner-level.
Experience in building strategic relationships, increasing Sales and aligning business development goals with partners
Interest in technology and understanding of complex technical concepts
Knowledge of Enterprise software solutions

 WHAT WE CAN DO FOR YOU

An innovative and stimulating work environment
Great training and career development
You will work with a diverse and global team made up of exceptionally passionate, talented and motivated colleagues who are established leaders in their field
Regular social events, team sports or musical activities (under normal conditions)
We pride ourselves in customer experience, Agility, Pragmatism, Positive attitude and enthusiasm, Team play, Continuous learning and Improvement and accountability. 
Ivalua received the Happy @ work France and Germany 2020.

COMPANY OVERVIEW
A “Magic Quadrant” leader, Ivalua’s solutions work in a complex global economy.  Our innovative Source-to-Pay solutions include automating customized workflows to source, contract, request, procure, receive, and pay for goods and services across the enterprise, refining the procurement lifecycle while reducing cost and risk of spending on indirect goods, direct goods and services, and improving supplier collaboration.
All companies want the best and brightest. At Ivalua, we also want team members who have a global point of view and who bring customer-focused enthusiasm and ambition to the table. We are a company of doers, of problem solvers, of figure-it-outers. We have fun and we work hard. This is a truly global company with a diverse team of contributors and a set of core values that people can feel every day across all our offices.
For more information please visit us on www.ivalua.com or check us out on LinkedIn.com
 
Check out our video and find out Who We Are!
Join Ivalua today and procure a great future for your career!
